meanings.definition: A mixed drink typically made with lime juice, carbonated water, and liquor.
meanings.sent1: At the party, they served refreshing rickeys to all the guests.
meanings.sent2: I ordered a delicious rickey at the bar last night.
meanings.sent3: The lime in the rickey was so sour, it made everyone pucker up!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up like a fizzy rickey on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent5: The bartender's specialty was a zesty rickey that left a lasting impression.
